name: Rumi
what_did:
Rumi wrote poems about love, the soul, and the universe.
He believed in kindness, peace, and the deep connection between people and God.
His words have been shared across the world for hundreds of years.
why_matters:
Rumi’s poems have touched people in many languages and cultures.
He helps readers think about love, purpose, and the beauty of life.
He is one of the most read poets in the world.

options: Poems about love and the soul

questions.q: Why are his poems still read?
options: They talk about deep feelings and wisdom

questions.q: What kind of writing did Rumi do?

fun_fact: Some people who follow Rumi’s ideas dance in a circle to feel closer to God — they’re called whirling dervishes!
